thread.title: Iran's Rouhani says Syrian regime must not be weakened
thread.title_full: Iran's Rouhani says Syrian regime must not be weakened | News24

author: news24.com
title: Iran's Rouhani says Syrian regime must not be weakened
text:
New York - Iran's President Hassan Rouhani on Sunday warned that the Syrian government must be allowed to remain in power to prevent ISIS from taking over the country.
Rouhani, in New York to attend the United Nations General Assembly meeting, argued that the priority must be combating ISIS extremists in Syria, and that "political reforms" could follow.
"If we are to succeed in fighting terrorism, the government in Damascus cannot be weakened. It must be able to carry on the fight," Rouhani told a gathering of academics and journalists in New York.
"If the Syrian government is taken out of the equation, the terrorists will enter Damascus" and "the whole country will become controlled territory, a safe haven for terrorists," he said.
